title: Riot, why is this not an icon. PLEASE make this an Icon.

replies.body: It would also make a pretty amazing Boards sticker.  Especially if its eyes animated.
Think we can get the Facebook emotes as boards stickers?

Could you pass it on and maybe try to get us something like this?

To be honest the boards stickers are lacking in numbers and character diversity, and could really use some new material.

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=slxGUWMO,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-08-18T11:44:52.657+0000)
>
> Could you pass it on and maybe try to get us something like this?
> 
> To be honest the boards stickers are lacking in numbers and character diversity, and could really use some new material.

Alright.  So I reached out to the peeps in charge of getting more stickers, and they are totally slammed right now helping out with the client update.  Which I should have realized.

I'm thinking that what we could do, though, is collect a list of ready-to-go images that can be used as stickers for when the client update work eventually calms down, and someone can be assigned to more cosmetic issues like these.

Well, we know where to start at least.
http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/4055/312/original.jpg?w=800&h
Why don't you make more boards stickers seriously?
Rammus "Ok" board sticker would be sweet.

If only
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Wow man.  What if it doesn't want to identify as a minion?  Every thought of that? Huh? HUH? Maybe it sexually identifies as an attack helicopter.  Why you got to assume it wants to be a minion bruh?
I identify as Godzilla. I see it perfectly logical that it can identify as a attack helicopter.

I support your decisions in life.  Be free my ~~man? woman?~~ 50-150 meter tall lizard of mass destruction!  Or of tea parties.  IDK how you choose to spend your free time.  Personally pushing over buildings seems like fun but to each their own.

> [{quoted}](name=Fondling Gems,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=slxGUWMO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-18T04:08:31.897+0000)
>
> Wow man.  What if it doesn't want to identify as a minion?  Every thought of that? Huh? HUH? Maybe it sexually identifies as an attack helicopter.  Why you got to assume it wants to be a minion bruh?

I sexually identify as an a-10 warthog. my triggers are ammunition sizes under 30mm and fire rates under 3,900 RPM. my pronouns are BRRRT/BBBBRRRRRTTTT/BBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT

if you are cis or isis i will BRRRT you.

For the male equivalent, if you are cis or isis, I will he you...

wat.

Icon, how about a Veigar skin?

Give us Minion Veigar skin with free chromas for Red, Blue, and Purple minions.
The minion who has to go through all the BS on the rift
The way he's checking her out is and then unimpressed is so hilarious like :"Oh! Would you look at tha-... wait... eh, not that great, 5/10 at best." **Unimpressed Minion is unimpressed**.
Just do it

I want to play as that minion. Unlike other minions, he seems to have emotions other than the standard angry or neutral. He seems disappointed. He seems special.

He is Grumpy Caster. The grump, caster equivalent to Helmet Bro.
If you look carefully you'll see in the login screen that this minions sometimes stare at ahri's butt
Agreed{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
